tax_brackets.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1964'
tax_brackets.notes: The values here are an approximation of the 1964 tax system. The rates are the 1954 rates with a 10% rebate applied. This rebate was capped at £100, which is not modelled here. The top rate of 76.5% is from previous years and is assumed to be the maximum rate.

ietc.notes: The 10% tax rebate is modelled in the tax brackets. The £100 cap on the rebate is not modelled.

wff.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2005).

ppl.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2002).

child_support.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 1991).

acc_levy.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1963'
acc_levy.notes: ACC scheme did not exist in this year.
